Bombshell: Of course!

He sends a signal to the cerebro shell in Periwinkle=
's head, it tells her to crap and eat it.

Bombshell: Nobody has as much fu=
n as me...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 7:55 AM
  Subject: Re:=
 Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


  McGowan: Hmm...You got a po=
int there....He is shit....Well, think it over and let me know.

  Brown wa=
s quite relieved that nothing happened yet. McGowan then whispered to him.
=

  McGowan: Don't be so relaxed....Any chivtron in my hands is sure to die.=
...

  Periwinkle dances around like a fool. She does the mambo and also da=
nces like Rikishi Phatu.

  Virgo and the others laugh.

  Virgo: Make her =
eat her own crap!...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Narrator =

    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 5:11=
 AM
    Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


    Chop =
Shop: (GASP!) Wouldn't that make me a dung beetle? I don't know, it'd be pr=
etty cool, actually.

    Barrage was hit by a shot from the base. He total=
ly ignored Apocalypse and aimed a gun at the shields. He was hit by another=
 shot, but then fired 2 missiles at the base. Ransack holds his hand out an=
d a charge comes out of his wrist. He pressed a button as it lands in his h=
and, and then throws it at the base. It's set to explode when the timer tic=
ks down. Venom was hit by 3 shots from the base and gasps.

    Bombshell: =
Hee hee hee! What should I make her do? Dance!

    He sends out a signal t=
o the shell in Periwinkle's head to make her dance...

      ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
      From: *Orchid* 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   =
   Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 3:51 AM
      Subject: Re: Insecticons=
. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


      OOC: Damn it! Who controls the base=
? Cause whoever does, reply to my attacks! I'm tired of being ignored! And =
yet everything seems to go on very casually. Why? Cause I'm not popular lik=
e Airly? And Airly, it is McGowan's team! Not Barrymore! And it's Barrymore=
 with an I...

      IC:

      Periwinkle stops struggling and stares into=
 space after the cerebro shell was inserted in her head. She was now Bombsh=
ell's slave...

      McGowan swiftly dodges the autoguns shots. Virgo, Bir=
dbot and Papertron are struck by the several shots but hold their ground. O=
n the other hand, Barrymore, Lee and Depp dodged the shots. Barrymore with =
a sidejump, Lee with and duck & roll and Depp with a high jump. She remembe=
red that although Pink was dead, they still had Brown.

      McGowan: I ho=
pe you Shitrons know that there is going to be another death over here! You=
r precious little Shitron is about to suffer!

      Depp passes Brown to M=
cGowan. McGowan first watches Virgo fire off 8 shots, Barrymore fire off 6 =
shots, Lee fire off 2 fireballs, Depp fire off 4 plasma shots, Birdbot fire=
 2 more grenades and Papertron fire off 10 shots. McGowan smiled, watching =
all of the shots go sailing towards the Chivtron base. McGowan turns to the=
 Insecticons.

      McGowan: Hey, if someone doesn't come out soon, would =
you mind eating this guy?

      Brown eyes widened and hoped that the Inse=
cticons would do something less brutal...

        ----- Original Message -=
---- 
        From: Airshadow Nightlight 
        To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
        Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 1:50 AM
        Subject: Re: I=
nsecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


        OOC: Regarding Rudra's =
ooc's post I'll post with Aerotaur. 

        Windlord/Aerotaur/Nightlight:=
:: 

        "Stop little one!!" said Aerotaur while he took at Trinity and=
 left her in Nightlight's arms. 

        "But I wanna help, uncle Aerotaur=
"said Trinity. 

        "No yet"replied Aerotaur  who turned on the base's=
 defences. 

        The external defences turned on and fired against the =
Insecticons and Barrimore's team.
